template.template: Linux filesystems by Zabbix agent active
template.name: Linux filesystems by Zabbix agent active

discovery_rule.name: Mounted filesystem discovery
discovery_rule.description: Discovery of file systems of different types.

trigger_prototype.name: {#FSNAME}: Running out of free inodes
trigger_prototype.description: It may become impossible to write to disk if there are no index nodes left. As symptoms, 'No space left on device' or 'Disk is full' errors may be seen even though free space is available.

trigger_prototype.name: {#FSNAME}: Running out of free inodes
trigger_prototype.description: It may become impossible to write to disk if there are no index nodes left. As symptoms, 'No space left on device' or 'Disk is full' errors may be seen even though free space is available.

trigger_prototype.expression: last(/Linux filesystems by Zabbix agent active/vfs.fs.size[{#FSNAME},pused])>{$VFS.FS.PUSED.MAX.CRIT:"{#FSNAME}"} and ((last(/Linux filesystems by Zabbix agent active/vfs.fs.size[{#FSNAME},total])-last(/Linux filesystems by Zabbix agent active/vfs.fs.size[{#FSNAME},used]))<{$VFS.FS.FREE.MIN.CRIT:"{#FSNAME}"} or timeleft(/Linux filesystems by Zabbix agent active/vfs.fs.size[{#FSNAME},pused],1h,100)<1d)
trigger_prototype.name: {#FSNAME}: Disk space is critically low
trigger_prototype.description: Two conditions should match: First, space utilization should be above {$VFS.FS.PUSED.MAX.CRIT:"{#FSNAME}"}. Second condition should be one of the following: - The disk free space is less than {$VFS.FS.FREE.MIN.CRIT:"{#FSNAME}"}. - The disk will be full in less than 24 hours.

trigger_prototype.expression: last(/Linux filesystems by Zabbix agent active/vfs.fs.size[{#FSNAME},pused])>{$VFS.FS.PUSED.MAX.WARN:"{#FSNAME}"} and ((last(/Linux filesystems by Zabbix agent active/vfs.fs.size[{#FSNAME},total])-last(/Linux filesystems by Zabbix agent active/vfs.fs.size[{#FSNAME},used]))<{$VFS.FS.FREE.MIN.WARN:"{#FSNAME}"} or timeleft(/Linux filesystems by Zabbix agent active/vfs.fs.size[{#FSNAME},pused],1h,100)<1d)
trigger_prototype.name: {#FSNAME}: Disk space is low
trigger_prototype.description: Two conditions should match: First, space utilization should be above {$VFS.FS.PUSED.MAX.WARN:"{#FSNAME}"}. Second condition should be one of the following: - The disk free space is less than {$VFS.FS.FREE.MIN.WARN:"{#FSNAME}"}. - The disk will be full in less than 24 hours.

dependency.name: {#FSNAME}: Disk space is critically low
dependency.expression: last(/Linux filesystems by Zabbix agent active/vfs.fs.size[{#FSNAME},pused])>{$VFS.FS.PUSED.MAX.CRIT:"{#FSNAME}"} and ((last(/Linux filesystems by Zabbix agent active/vfs.fs.size[{#FSNAME},total])-last(/Linux filesystems by Zabbix agent active/vfs.fs.size[{#FSNAME},used]))<{$VFS.FS.FREE.MIN.CRIT:"{#FSNAME}"} or timeleft(/Linux filesystems by Zabbix agent active/vfs.fs.size[{#FSNAME},pused],1h,100)<1d)

item.host: Linux filesystems by Zabbix agent active
Linux filesystems by Zabbix agent active

override.name: Skip metadata collection for dynamic FS

macro.description: The critical threshold of the filesystem utilization.
The warning threshold of the filesystem utilization.
This macro is used in filesystems discovery. Can be overridden on the host or linked template level
